page.title: 07FARMING-RAMPSIDE HALL
page.content:
Rampside Hall started in a colourful and cheerful history as a lady said to her fiance I will marry you if you have a house made which is different from any other house in the world. The fiance built a house with twelve chimmneys and a fireplace for each one.Then disaster struck. About four years ago an anonymous person said he was going to buy Rampside Hall and repair it, but he never did, so the hall lapsed into even more ruin.As a result of the anonymous person,no one stood a chance of bidding for the hall.
{BOW-WINDOWS-FARM} Bow-windows-farm is dated from 1604.The farm is roughly 50 acres.
